library.name: Core
library.description: Core library. Unlike other libraries, this library is implicitly imported. Contains various common-use functions.

function.name: assert
function.arg: Value to check. Error is generated if false.
message to display in the error if the condition is false. If none is provided, a generic message is displayed instead.
function.description: Causes a crash if the given condition is not true.

function.name: print
function.description:
Outputs a value to standard output.
For platforms that do not support standard output, the closest equivalent is used. Notably for JavaScript, this is the developer's console.
